404.title: SQUUAAWWKKK!! THIS PAGE IS MISSING.
404.subtext_html: Looks like Carl has had too many Piña Coladas and stumbled into the server room again. Feel free to keep shopping—we'll just be here holding his feathers back while he sobs into the throne.

category_sort_description.the_ogs: Our signature line of shades.|all-models---Our signature line of shades for regular-sized heads.|running-sunglasses---Our signature line of running shades.|beasting---Our signature line of shades built for beasts.|golf-sunglasses---Flamingo Eye™ enhanced shades for regular-sized heads.|biking---Our signature line of shades built for whatever 2 wheels can ride over.
category_sort_description.bfgs: Wider frames, longer arms, and bigger lenses.|all-models---Wider frames, longer arms, and bigger lenses.|running-sunglasses---For big-headed runners or those who prefer more coverage.|beasting---Beasts are built bigger, so are these BFGs.|golf-sunglasses---Flamingo Eye™ enhanced shades for John Daly-sized heads.|biking---Wider frames, longer arms, and bigger lenses.
category_sort_description.the_runways: Performance styled in a high-fashion cat eye shape.|all-models---Performance styled in a high-fashion cat eye shape.|running-sunglasses---Running performance styled in a high-fashion cat eye shape.|beasting---Beast performance styled in a high-fashion cat eye shape.|golf-sunglasses---Flamingo Eye™ performance styled in a high-fashion cat eye shape.|biking---Performance for cycling styled in a high-fashion cat eye shape.
category_sort_description.super_flys: Unique style, wide lens coverage, 1/2 the weight of an energy bar.|all-models---Unique style, wide lens coverage, 1/2 the weight of an energy bar.|running-sunglasses---Unique style, wide lens coverage, 1/2 the weight of an energy bar.|beasting---Unique style, wide lens coverage, 1/2 the weight of an energy bar.|golfing---Unique style, wide lens coverage, 1/2 the weight of an energy bar.|biking---Unique style, wide lens coverage, 1/2 the weight of an energy bar.
category_sort_description.circle_gs: Round sunglasses for the active hipster.|all-models---Round sunglasses for the active hipster.|golf-sunglasses---Flamingo Eye™ round sunglasses for the fashion-forward weekend golfer.
category_sort_description.mach_gs: Aviator sunglasses built for any need, including speed|all-models---Aviator sunglasses built for any need, including speed
category_sort_description.phgs: Round frames with its distinguished double nose bridge feature, is snug and light-weight
category_sort_description.wrap_gs: EXTREMELY EXTREME SUNGLASSES FOR EXTREMELY EXTREME PEOPLE. ﻿

tag_sort_description.road: Like a fresh coat of ceramic chain lube, our road cycling sunglasses are built for speed.
tag_sort_description.mountain: Mixed terrain with shady spots? We got you (and your eyes) covered.
tag_sort_description.gravel: Rocky roads? Wear GOLF goodr shades for better visibility.
tag_sort_description.triathlon: Want the best coverage while riding aero? Wear these shades.
tag_sort_description.cx: Cross is coming. Get a hand up, a leg up, and your shades up.
tag_sort_description.city: Best sunglasses for commuting? Look no further.
tag_sort_description.game: Sunglasses for gamers. Why? Because gamers go outside too.
tag_sort_description.blue_mirage: Blue blocking glasses perfect for any screen, any face, any light (especially blue light, yuck).
